name: Endobiotic
description:
Game Description:

Each death changes your form. Player can interact with different objects each time you change forms.

Keyboard Controls :
  • Move: W A S D
  • Action/Attack Button: E
XBOX Controller:
  • Move: Left Joystick 
  • Action Button: X
Game Instructions: 
  • Get to the exit door at the end! 
  •  Use Manipulator form to press buttons and open chests 
  •  Use Transport form to push blocks 
  •  Use Electronic form to repair circuits to power batteries. The batteries will power switches
  •  Use Magnetic form to flip switches 
  •  Use Destroyer form to break green blocks 
  •  Use Battery form to pick up the last battery
Game Credits
  • Daniel Cox- Lead Game Developer, Game Story Teller, Game Designer
  • Ben Topple  - Lead Game Designer, Game Programmer, Audio
  • James Dalziel - Gameplay Programmer, Game Designer, Special Effects Designer, Game Mentor
